column5: My place is close to the popular dining and shopping district of Knox/Henderson. Knox Street restaurants and bars (including Starbucks & a trader joes) are just 3 blocks north. My condo is centrally located: $10 uber from Love Field airport, 1 mile to uptown area, and 2.5 miles to downtown. Youâ€™ll love my place because of the coziness yet open feeling, the location, and the high ceilings. My place is good for couples and solo adventurers.
